<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables></variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="0" y="4"></block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="-23" y="84">

      <block type="cbit_RGB">
        <field name="pin1">AnalogPin.P0</field>
        <field name="pin2">AnalogPin.P1</field>
        <field name="pin3">AnalogPin.P2</field>
        <value name="value1">

main.ts:
basic.forever(() => {
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    255,
    0,
    0
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    0,
    255,
    0
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    0,
    0,
    255
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    255,
    255,
    0
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    255,
    0,
    255
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    192,
    255,
    62
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    148,
    0,
    211
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    188,
    238,
    0
    )
    basic.pause(500)
    cbit_显示类.RGB(
    AnalogPin.P0,
    AnalogPin.P1,
    AnalogPin.P2,
    0,
    197,
    205
    )
    basic.pause(500)
})
